price: 50. Respondieron: «No nos importa lo que podáis hacernos, pues, ciertamente, retornaremos a nuestro Señor (en la otra vida).
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا ضَيۡرَۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā ḍayra innā ilā rabbinā munqalibūna
